title: Z_MBFM
author: Z_MBFM
content: Quote from: leonair on November 29, 2023, 02:41:48 AMQuote from: Z_MBFM on November 29, 2023, 02:32:50 AMHello how are you mateI need some btc immediately can you please lend me $140 in btc. we have long relationship in this forum hope you will accept my request My btc address - 3Bdpp4aWnYq13muHEEEWfkbfGRwwMiaAsyThanks in advance Z_MBFM  I have send you $140 btc. I feel no shame about it.  But can you post this in the forum without making it private? I will not demand any interest from you.  But hope to get my money back within 15 days.  thanks Transcation has - https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/transaction/4425206357343335ebad5f7da14106836cd9d5a3b2f2f12387147f2afe6e25faThank you @leonair i will repay your money in time. don't be afraid.Z_MBFM

comments.author: Z_MBFM
comments.body: leonair i have $130 in btc now. It can be credited to your wallet as much as $127 after deducting the transaction fee. I want to send my btc can you please give me your wallet where you want to received btc?

comments.body: Quote from: Z_MBFM on December 03, 2023, 02:14:57 PMQuote from: leonair on December 03, 2023, 01:47:47 PMQuote from: Z_MBFM on December 03, 2023, 12:48:46 PMleonair i have $130 in btc now. It can be credited to your wallet as much as $127 after deducting the transaction fee. I want to send my btc can you please give me your wallet where you want to received btc? Sure you can send here   3FuXqefR1FEwphkxLVrWHg4gr5dg1YK67gand please Don't forget to post transcation id Thanks for quick repayTranscation id - https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/transaction/846d922e849edfe9101fbfd45c5d73cdb7538b0dcb90b15dde9b53628bf882d6?from=trustwalletthe rest amount i will pay next week after received signature payment. thank you in advance for your PatienceZ_MBFM   Your transaction has been pending for the last three days and the Bitcoin transaction fee has increased more than your set transaction fee. If the Bitcoin transaction fee does not decrease, your transaction may be canceled and the Bitcoins returned to you.  So if it gets bounced back to you then resend it again. And expect that if the transaction fails then you will refund the full amount in the next transaction. Thanks
